definition: given to expressing oneself freely or insistently, music intended to be performed by one or more singers, usually with instrumental accompaniment
details:
adjective
- given to expressing oneself freely or insistently
= example: given to expressing oneself freely or insistently
= synonyms: outspoken
- full of the sound of voices
= example: full of the sound of voices
- having or using the power to produce speech or sound
= example: having or using the power to produce speech or sound
- relating to or designed for or using the singing voice
= example: relating to or designed for or using the singing voice
noun
- music intended to be performed by one or more singers, usually with instrumental accompaniment
= example: music intended to be performed by one or more singers, usually with instrumental accompaniment
= synonyms: vocal music
